Identification.LongTitle: An Act to provide for the recognition of the Beaver (Castor canadensis) as a symbol of the sovereignty of Canada

Section.Text: This Act may be cited as the National Symbol of Canada Act.

Section.MarginalNote: Beaver as a symbol of Canadian sovereignty
Section.Text: It is hereby recognized and declared that the Beaver (Castor canadensis) is a symbol of the sovereignty of Canada and it is proclaimed that any representation of the Beaver (Castor canadensis) when used by Her Majesty in right of Canada shall be so used and so regarded.
